name: From the case files of Dean Twinny: The Maltese Dice
name_original: From the case files of Dean Twinny: The Maltese Dice
description:
Make your way through a twilight city as Dean Twinny, private Die. Where is the Maltese dice necklace, and who's involved in it's disappearance? 

Dean is unpredictable, but you can choose what emotions he favors in his mental die. Ask around and investigate items to reveal the secrets swirling between the colorful personalities. Everyone has their secrets...

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam with completely original music, art assets, effects, animations, and code in the Godot engine with the Dialogic plugin.

Team

Jason McCollum

Thomas Boyster

Enjoy!
